root.name: F-19 Stealth Fighter
root.description: Released in 1990, F-19 Stealth Fighter was flight simulator that allowed the player to take control of various types of jets (including the titular F-19) to accomplish a variety of missions. The missions were varied, and included seek-and-destroy, stealth recon, bombing runs, and escort types.In between missions, a short scene would play out. Depending on how the player performed, the character could either sit alone in a bar or would be surrounded by friends and onlookers. The player could also rack up various medals and awards throughout a career.
